name: Code Quiz
description: The application allows user to take a timed quiz answering questions about JavaScript.

name: Note Taker
description: The Note Taker app can be used to write and save notes.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: The application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the work day, 9am-5pm.

name: Budget Tracker
description: The PWA budget tracker application allows the user to be able to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without a connection.
languages: Node, Express, JavaScript, mongoDB, mongoose, nodemon

name: Power Up Workout App
description: Power-up is an easy tool to track a person's workout routine. It helps users find new exercises that they  might have not even known existed and keep them in one place to track easily.
languages: Apollo, Bcrypt, Express, GraphQL, JSON Web Tokens, Mongoose, React, Bulma

name: Password Generator
description: This application allows the user to generate a random password, between 8 and 128 characters in length, based on criteria they have selected - uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, or special characters.
